title: Spicy Breaded Chicken
ingredients: ['225ml (8 fl oz) buttermilk', '4 tablespoons hot sauce, such as Tabasco', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '100g (4 oz) dried breadcrumbs', '7 tablespoons plain flour', '1 teaspoon cornflour', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '1 teaspoon garlic salt', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
